definition: tediously repetitious or lacking in variety, the quality of wearisome constancy, routine, and lack of variety
details:
adjective
- tediously repetitious or lacking in variety
= example: tediously repetitious or lacking in variety
= synonyms: monotonous
- not challenging
= synonyms: commonplace, prosaic, unglamorous, unglamourous
noun
- the quality of wearisome constancy, routine, and lack of variety
= synonyms: monotony, sameness
